name: Middlecooked
description:
It is a game based in Overcooked and it is part of a University Project.

Cook the recets that appear at the top of the screen

Play single or multiplayer.

Player 1 Controls

Move with ASDW - A: Left, D: Right, W: Up, S: Down

Take and leave objects and ingredients pressing Space Bar

Do actions like chop, wash, extinguish the fire pressing X

Do boost pressing Left-Shift

Player 2 Controls

Move with Arrows- Left, Right, Up, Down

Take and leave objects and ingredients pressing B

Do actions like chop, wash, extinguish the fire pressing M

Do boost pressing N
